name: Tooltip for Gravity Forms
author: DivDojo

sections.description:
Add tooltips next to field labels very easily.
July 2021 Update: Now you can use shortcodes as tooltip content!
Big Update: You can now use HTMLs in your tooltip and choose themes, animations, placements!

How to use:

  • Add your text to the “Tooltip Text” field while editing gravity forms fields.
  • Save changes and tooltips will appear next to label automatically in the form.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload gravity-forms-tooltip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Add Tooltips next to field labels of Gravity Forms.
description:
Add tooltips next to field labels very easily.
July 2021 Update: Now you can use shortcodes as tooltip content!
Big Update: You can now use HTMLs in your tooltip and choose themes, animations, placements!

How to use:

  • Add your text to the “Tooltip Text” field while editing gravity forms fields.
  • Save changes and tooltips will appear next to label automatically in the form.
